byte array



byte_array

typedef uint8 *byte_array;
type: C typedef
description: byte_array is size | data | terminator

c_byte_array_size

size_t     c_byte_array_size(const byte_array array);
type: C function
description: get byte array size

c_byte_array_alloc

byte_array c_byte_array_alloc(size_t size);
type: C function
description: allocate byte array of size bytes

c_byte_array_free

void       c_byte_array_free(byte_array array);
type: C function
description: free byte array

c_byte_array_realloc

byte_array c_byte_array_realloc(byte_array array, size_t size);
type: C function
description: reallocate byte array

c_fbyte_array_size

#define c_fbyte_array_size c_byte_array_size
type: C preprocessor definition
description: get fixed byte array size

fbyte_array_struct

#define fbyte_array_struct(name, size) struct { size_t size; uint8 bytes[size + 1]; } name
type: C preprocessor definition
description: declare fixed byte array

fbyte_array_init

#define fbyte_array_init(size) { size }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: initialize fixed byte array

fbyte_array_name

#define fbyte_array_name(name) CONCAT2(_fixed_byte_array_, name)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: named of fixed byte array when declared on stack

fbyte_array_var

#define fbyte_array_var(name, size) fbyte_array_struct(fbyte_array_name(name), size) = fbyte_array_init(size); memset(fbyte_array_name(name).bytes, 0, size + 1); byte_array name = fbyte_array_name(name).bytes
type: C preprocessor definition
description: declare & initialize fixed string on the stack
